name: h3
description: Elevate your game with the 2026 Easton Dub Drop 5 USSSA Baseball Bat, where every swing makes a bold statement. Designed for players who infuse energy and confidence into every at-bat, this bat features Easton's pioneering Double Barrel technology, offering the lowest barrel compression for unmatched barrel flex and elite performance. Its two-piece composite construction minimizes vibration while maximizing flex, complemented by the ConneXion Max elastomer connection for smooth, powerful contact even on mishits. The Optiflex handle provides the perfect balance between flex and stiffness, enhancing barrel control and raw power, making it ideal for elite athletes seeking to boost their bat speed and performance. Stand out on the field with game-changing power and style; the Easton Dub is your key to dominating the diamond. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: X1 Bat Per Household: Due to High Demand
Double Barrel: Increased flex & elite performance across the barrel
ConneXion Max Connector: Smooth & powerful contact
OptiFlex Handle: Provides perfect balance of stiffness & flex
